channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: TSMC sticks with its revenue forecast after profit tops estimates despite Trump trade worries
item.description: TSMC beat profit expectations for the first quarter, thanks to a continued surge in demand for AI chips.

item.title: Hermès to hike U.S. prices for iconic bags and scarves in response to Trump tariffs
item.description: The French luxury giant will look to "fully offset" the impact of blanket 10% tariffs with price hikes from May 1, it said Thursday.

item.title: United Airlines gives two 2025 profit outlooks, calling economy 'impossible' to predict
item.description: United Airlines said a deterioration in bookings could lead it to lower its 2025 outlook to $7 to $9 a share from $11.50 to $13.50.

item.title: Critical chip firm ASML misses order expectations amid tariff uncertainty
item.description: ASML reported net bookings of 3.94 billion euros ($4.47 billion) for the first quarter, versus a Reuters reported forecast of 4.89 billion euros.

item.title: Abbott Labs shares surge on earnings and a big sign of confidence in the business
item.description: Abbott's strong stock performance continued Wednesday after a first-quarter earnings beat and a guidance reaffirmation.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
